requests.name: UserAccess GET pokemons [AFTER LOGGING BACK IN]
AdminAccess GET pokemons [AFTER LOGGING BACK IN]
UserRegistration to test Logging in with wrong password
Accessing route with no token in query

tests.value: A token is required to access this route

settings.docs:
# Configure Env before running tests: ## Create new Env with these Key, Value pairs: ### (Make sure to create a new enviornment, DON'T use the Global Env) AUTH-TOKEN: null
ADMIN-AUTH-TOKEN: null ## Attach Env to test collection - Hover over the test collection, "Assignment2Tests" - Then click on the icon to the right and access the settings - Then click on "Tests" and attach the Env there After following these steps, the tests should work just fine.
